de.esoco.process

Interface ProcessScheduler


  • public interface ProcessScheduler
    An interface for classes that perform the periodic scheduling of processes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScheduleProcess(Entity rProcessDescription)
      Adds the schedule process defined by the Entity to the management of the scheduler.
      Entity getScheduleProcessUser()
      Must be implemented by subclasses to provide access to the entity to be used as the schedule process user.
      boolean isProcessSchedulingEnabled()
      Returns TRUE if the process scheduler is enabled and FALSE otherwise.
      void notifyScheduleProcessChanged()
      Notify about a change or edit of a schedule process.
      void notifyScheduleProcessFinished(Process rProcess)
      Notify about a schedule process that has finished execution.
      void notifyScheduleProcessStarting(Process rProcess)
      Notify about a schedule process that is about to start execution.
      void removeScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
      Removes the process from the management of the scheduler.
      void resumeProcess(java.lang.Class<? extends ProcessDefinition> rProcessDefinitionClass)
      Resumes the execution of a process if it is currently suspended.
      void resumeScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
      Resumes the process defined by the Entity-Id.
      void runScheduleProcessNow(java.lang.String sEntityId)
      Runs the process defined by the Entity immediately.
      void suspendScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
      Stops the schedule process and suspends the execution of this process until resumeScheduleProcess is called.

    • Method Detail

      • addScheduleProcess

        void addScheduleProcess(Entity rProcessDescription)
        Adds the schedule process defined by the Entity to the management of the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        rProcessDescription - The Entity that defines the schedule process.

      • getScheduleProcessUser

        Entity getScheduleProcessUser()
        Must be implemented by subclasses to provide access to the entity to be used as the schedule process user.
        Returns:
        An entity instance that will be used as the user of schedule processes

      • isProcessSchedulingEnabled

        boolean isProcessSchedulingEnabled()
        Returns TRUE if the process scheduler is enabled and FALSE otherwise.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the process scheduler is enabled and FALSE otherwise.

      • notifyScheduleProcessChanged

        void notifyScheduleProcessChanged()
        Notify about a change or edit of a schedule process.

      • notifyScheduleProcessFinished

        void notifyScheduleProcessFinished(Process rProcess)
        Notify about a schedule process that has finished execution.
        Parameters:
        rProcess - The schedule process that has finished

      • notifyScheduleProcessStarting

        void notifyScheduleProcessStarting(Process rProcess)
        Notify about a schedule process that is about to start execution.
        Parameters:
        rProcess - The schedule process that is starting

      • removeScheduleProcess

        void removeScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
        Removes the process from the management of the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        sEntityId - ProcessDescription the Entity that defines the schedule process

      • resumeProcess

        void resumeProcess(java.lang.Class<? extends ProcessDefinition> rProcessDefinitionClass)
        Resumes the execution of a process if it is currently suspended. This is useful if a schedule process should be run immediately although it is in an idle state waiting the period time for the next execution.
        Parameters:
        rProcessDefinitionClass - The process description of the schedule process

      • resumeScheduleProcess

        void resumeScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
        Resumes the process defined by the Entity-Id.
        Parameters:
        sEntityId - The Id of the Entity that defines the process.

      • runScheduleProcessNow

        void runScheduleProcessNow(java.lang.String sEntityId)
        Runs the process defined by the Entity immediately.
        Parameters:
        sEntityId - rProcessDescription The Entity that defines the schedule process.

      • suspendScheduleProcess

        void suspendScheduleProcess(java.lang.String sEntityId)
        Stops the schedule process and suspends the execution of this process until resumeScheduleProcess is called.
        Parameters:
        sEntityId - The Id of the Entity that defines the process.
